Package fast3d.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    a color in 3d-space is represented by 4 values: r(red),g(green),b(blue) and alpha(transparency) in the rgba-model, but the values of r,g,b and alpha have to in the interval [0d,1d]
    used for lighting and general coloring in a 3d-graphics-context
    Graphics3d
    with a graphics3d you can draw directly onto a regular 2d-screen but in 3d
    Texture
    used to store a texture for a TextureTriangle
    Turtle3d
    gives the ability to draw directly into a 3d-scenery like a turtle
    each turtle-method starts with t
    you can move around in the scenery drawing lines or not (specified by tsetPen(Color or null)), push and pop on a history of transformations and rotate the turtle on it's own coordinate system
    on default the pen is down
